items.checkin_comment: Great brew, but the lemon flavor seems to overpower any of the flavor from the orange peel.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 26)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 27!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking opening a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 15 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 4!
It may not be cloudy outside, but your brew definitely is! That’s at least 5 different hefeweizens. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: Subtle bourbon flavor. I like this one better than the unaged version.

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 1 year on Untappd!

items.comment: Yep, they were. Probably the best one I've had from them. They also have a barrel aged version.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 80 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 17!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 65 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 14!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 20 check-ins with a photo.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 165 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 34.

items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 26!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 105 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 22!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 90 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 19!

Congratulations for breaking out of whatever beerless situation was upon you and for sampling some of our Jailbreak creations! Enjoy a complimentary 4-ounce pour on us for Level 2 and each level above that! Just show this badge to a bartender.
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!

items.checkin_comment: 2019 brewfest at the farm. A good summer beer.

items.checkin_comment: 2019 brewfest at the farm. Light and crisp, a good summer beer.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 160 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 33.

items.checkin_comment: 2019 brewfest at the farm. A little to sweet for me, probably from the cranberries.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 55 distinct venues!

items.checkin_comment: 2019 brewfest at the farm. The mild ale seems to get overpowered by the addition of blackberry.

items.badge_description: A beer a day will keep the doctor away... or something like that. That’s 30 brews in a month!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 75 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 16!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 65 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 14!

items.checkin_comment: 2019 brewfest at the farm. More hazy than most I've had

items.checkin_comment: Would have liked a little more emphasis on the apricot, compared to the sour, but still a good beer overall.

items.badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 20 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 5.

June is Pride Month and we want to recognize the impact LGBTQ+ people have had in the world, the beer industry, and our company. Read more about it on our blog →

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 10 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 3.
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 55 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.checkin_comment: Good rye spice, but not too overly spicy. The hops and rye are nicely balanced.
